"What the?": "Emergency announcement! We are currently preparing for a large-scale operation in the Aelio Region. All ARKS, please prepare to sortie."
"Are you reading me? It hasn't been confirmed yet, but we just picked up a signal that looks like it could be Dark Falz."
"I'm currently readying the Central Cannon. Please make your own preparations and be ready to intercept at a moment's notice."
"Did you hear that?! It might be Dark Falz!"
"Indeed. We were contacted over here as well."
"We'll definitely... definitely take him down! Together!"
"I'm always ready. What about you, Aina?"
